瓌字的基本解释

瓌
guī
古同“瑰”。

瓌字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》公回切，平灰，見。］
［《廣韻》户恢切，平灰，匣。］
亦作“1”。亦作“璝1”。亦作“瓌1”。
(1)亦作“瓌”。美石，或曰珠。
(2)亦作“瓌”。大；魁伟。
(3)亦作“瓌”。珍贵；珍奇。参见“瑰異”、“瑰材”。
(4)亦作“瓌”。美，美丽。参见“瑰姿”、“瑰麗”。
(5)见“玫瑰”。

瓌字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瓌； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页745第07
【廣韻】與瑰同。◎按《正字通》入十五畫，非。今攺正。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guang Yun" Gong Hui cut, flat gray, see. ]
["Guang Yun" Hu Hui cut, flat gray, box. ]
Also known as "1". Also known as "璝1". Also known as "瓌1".
(1) Also known as "瓌". Beautiful stone, or pearl.
(2) Also known as "瓌". Big; burly.
(3) Also known as "瓌". Precious; rare. See "Rose", "Rose".
(4) Also known as "瓌". Beauty, beauty. See "majestic", "brilliant".
(5) See "rose".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瓌; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 745 Page 07
[Guangyun] Same as Gui. ◎According to "Zhengzitong" to enter fifteen paintings, no. I am now.
